name: ZombieMayhemFinal
description: MAP WITH DIRECTIONS INCLUDED IN MAIN FOLDER OF GAME Instructions: AVOID RADIOACTIVE SLUDGE and follow these directions: go into graveyard straight ahead, turn left before giant puddle of sludge, shoot through walls with red light on them, pick up key, return to start area, shoot through walls, take key to garden gate, enter garden and drop off first key at table, pick up second key, open gate outside of garden to the right when exiting the garden. Go through shed and drop off second key at dumpster and pick up orb. Return through graveyard and head past the giant sludge puddle and take key to crypt to find goal. Note sometimes the final gate takes a moment to trigger animation.
